title: Sinful Hands
description: LucasI was obsessed from the beginning.And once I have an obsession.It's best you don't get in my way.ChanelI tried to stay away.He was the one who was whispered about on the streets.The viper that, once he had a taste, would hunt you down and collect you.And Lucas liked to collect things.One of those things was me.Sinful Hands is Book 1 in the Chanel & Lucas duet, and is part of the Chained Hearts Duet world.
author: T.L.  Smith
